name: searing-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.black_white: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. It may leave targets with a burn.
